db:abstract.db:para: The MapCopyrightNotice item displays the current valid copyright notice for a Map element.
This type was introduced in QtLocation 5.9.

db:listitem.db:para: MapCopyrightNotice is part of QML Maps Plugin

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This object can be used to place an additional copyright notices programmatically.
Note that declaring a MapCopyrightNotice inside a QtLocation::Map element is not possible, like for any other QQuickItem.
The release of this API with Qt 5.9 is a Technology Preview.

db:section.db:title: mapSource : Map
db:section.db:para: This property holds the current map source providing the copyright data shown in this notice. In order to let the MapCopyrightNotice display a copyright, this property must be set, as it is the only data source for this element.

db:section.db:title: styleSheet : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the current css2.1 style sheet used to style the copyright notice, if in HTML form.
